sentences: Selle projekti tähtaeg on määratud kolmeks nädalaks.
Meie kohtumise aeg on määratud homale kell 10.
context: The Estonian word 'määratud' is the past participle form of the verb 'määrata', meaning to determine, fix, appoint or specify. It describes something that has been set in advance, established as a particular value, time, quantity, or condition. This adjective form is commonly used when referring to predetermined deadlines, times, quantities, limits, or conditions that have been formally decided upon.
